content:
An update, after Floris approved (thanks!!!) one major step in the ordered refactor: everything from the bottom up to ordered_groups now uses the new typeclass system!

The next PR #7645 is now quite short and starts with changing linear_ordered_comm_group_with_zero. I am just recovering from the end of the exam season, so I have not been able to make further progress, but the next step will be for me to look back at my experiments with monotonicity of multiplication by positive/nonnegative elements and finish the refactor across ordered_ring/field. I hope that these two extra files will be easier to refactor into smaller-sized PRs, since most of the building blocks should already be available.

I will keep everyone updated! :wink:
Thanks a lot for all your hard work!
